title: [Decimation | Wiki] 1.7.10行尸模组的官方Wiki翻译:服务器创建
author: MC小菜鸡
txt_content:
This is a quick step by step tutorial on how to install a Decimation Server using the provided server tools/template. You can get the server tools/template from here. Please use the following tutorial to successfully set up a Server for Decimation:
这是关于如何创建一个Decimation服务器的快速分步教程。您可以从这里获取服务器工具/模板。请使用以下教程成功设置抽取服务器：


Files & Mod Setup:
Copy all files from the .Zip file into a new folder. (Call the folder something like "Decimation Server") Once all files have been copied from the .Zip file into the new folder, download the latest version of Decimation from our Website (https://www.mcdecimation.net/download/) and place the .jar file into your /mods/ folder.
文件和Mod创建:

将.zip文件中的所有文件复制到新文件夹中。（将文件夹像“Decimation Server”这样命名）复制完所有文件到文件夹后，回到我们的网站上下载最新版本的Decimation模组(https://www.mcdecimation.net/download/)并且放到你服务器的/mods/文件夹


Configuring and Launching:
Open the server.properties file and ensure that all necessary properties have been set (Please make sure to include the server ip in your server.properties file. If your properties file only shows "localhost", your Server will NOT be added to the Decimation community server list. Double click the ScottehStartupScript-0.1a.sh (for linux, use the command phrase: 'sudo sh start.sh ScottehStartScript-0.1a.sh' ). If neither of these methods work, you will have to open a command prompt and use the command 'java -jar thermos.jar'.
配置和启动:
打开server.properties文件并检查是否已设置所有重要配置（请确保在server.properties文件中有写入服务器IP）。如果配置文件只显示“localhost”则不会将服务器添加到Decimation社区服务器列表中。双击ScottehStartupScript-0.1a.sh(对于Linux，使用命令短语sudo sh start.sh ScottehStartScript-0.1a.sh' )如果这些方法都不起作用，则必须打开cmd/.bat，并使用命令“Java-Jar Halth.jar”。

Post-Launch Help:
Once the start script has loaded, enter "thermos.jar" as the designated jar file, then type your designated RAM amount (example: "4G", "512M"). The Server has successfully launched! Once the server has launched, several new files will be created in your servers main directory, (Such as decimation_server.properties). Be sure to configure these settings appropriately.

启动后的帮助:
一旦开始脚本已经加载，输入“thermos.jar”作为指定的jar文件，然后输入要分配给服务器的内存数量（例如：“4g”、“512M”）。服务器已成功启动！一旦服务器启动，将在您的服务器主目录中创建多个新文件（如decimation_server.properties）。确保正确设置了你需要的配置。



Community Server List
If you wish to add your server to our community server list, please ensure that your Server IP and Server Port are both placed in your server.properties file. Also ensure that you've set enableCommunityServerList to true in your decimation_server.properties file. (A server restart is required). Keep in mind that Servers are not added if their MOTD contains illegal characters or URLs.

社区服务器列表
如果想将服务器添加到我们的社区服务器列表中，请确保您的服务器IP和服务器端口都正确写在server.properties文件中。还要确保在decimation_server.properties文件中将enableCommunityServerList设置为true。（需要重新启动服务器）。请记住，如果服务器的MOTD包含非法字符或URL，则不会在社区服务器列表中添加你的服务器。


原贴地址:https://www.boehmod.com/forum/ewr-carta/deci_server_setup/
